title: Chantilly Pink Super Soft Premium Cotton Lounge Pants
story_description:
Story Indulge in ultimate comfort and style with these solid pink Lounge Pants, the perfect
addition to your loungewear collection. These lounge pants boast a classic and sophisticated design,
featuring a solid pink pattern, creating a sense of balance and elegance. It features a drawstring
closure for utmost comfort and two side pockets and one back pocket to carry all your essential
items. Crafted using a slight sheen fabric blended with pure cotton, these lounge pants are soft and
gentle against the skin, providing a luxurious feel that is unmatched. So what are you waiting for?
slip into these lounge pants, relax, and enjoy the ultimate in comfort and style.

title: White Linen Lounge Pant
story_description:
Story Comfort is key at bedtime. Add some snappy style to your sleep-ready look. These luxuriously
soft pyjama pants are crafted from an ultra-soft Premium Linen and Cotton Blend while moisture
wicking keeps you cool and dry. Reach for these pants from French Crown when you're Ready to wind
down.

title: Bright White with Alizarin Crimson Red Premium Cotton Lounge Pants
story_description:
Story Fabric: 100% Mercerized Combed Cotton. Double reinforced front, back and side seams. Durable
broad waistband with Concealed Strings. Thoughtful Construction. Two Pockets. One with Zipper.
Concealed button placket with a front opening. Ideal for loungewear and leisure wear. Half elastic,
No Crumbling in Front.
description:
Fabric: 100% Mercerized Combed Cotton.Double reinforced front, back and side seams.Durable broad
waistband with Concealed Strings.Thoughtful Construction.Two Pockets. One with Zipper.Concealed
button placket with a front opening.Ideal for loungewear and leisure wear.Half elastic, No Crumbling
in Front.

title: Casal Green Premium Cotton Lounge Pants
story_description:
Story Mediumweight, easy to slip on, and practical, these lounge pants from French Crown make a
reliable addition to your bottom wear collection. The soft and breathable cotton build allows you to
stay at ease for long hours. With drawstring closure, they can be worn comfortably and have two side
pockets and one back pocket. Style it with your graphic t-shirt and flip-flops.

pants with black or blue tees for a relaxed look.

title: Bright White with Port Gore Plaid Premium Cotton Lounge Pant
story_description:
Story You will love the style and comfort offered by these bright white with port gore plaid lounge
pants from French Crown. Designed with the strongest poplin weave, these lounge pants feature both
drawstring and button closure. Pair it with black tees and head out for a stroll.

title: Viva Magenta Premium Cotton Lounge Pants
story_description:
Story Mediumweight, easy to slip on, and practical, these lounge pants from French Crown make a
reliable addition to your bottom wear collection. The soft and breathable cotton build allows you to
stay at ease for long hours. With drawstring closure, they can be worn comfortably and have two side
pockets and one back pocket. Style it with your graphic t-shirt and flip-flops.
description:

title: Jagged Ice Blue Striped Linen Lounge Pants
story_description:
Story Feel relaxed in these striped lounge pants from French Crown and style them with your
favourite T-shirts. It features a drawstring closure that ensures you feel relaxed all day, while
the linen and cotton blend fabric is both comfortable and durable. The white and blue stripes add a
touch of edginess to the classic lounge pant design, making these pants perfect for lounging around
the house or running errands in style. Get ready to turn heads and make a statement in these cool
lounge pants that are sure to become a wardrobe favorite.

title: White with royal blue Flowers Printed Premium Cotton Designer Lounge Pant

title: Bright White with Black Striped Premium Cotton Lounge Pants
story_description:
Story These Lounge Pants from French Crown are designed for comfort and style. Crafted from the
finest cotton material, these lounge pants are perfect for a lazy day at home or a casual outing
with friends. The lightweight nature of the material makes it perfect for any season, keeping you
cool and comfortable in the summer months and warm and cozy in the colder months. The elastic
waistband and drawstring closures ensure a secure and comfortable fit, making these pants perfect
for lounging, sleeping, or engaging in any casual activity.
